## get_psychopy_pos_from_trackbox { #get_psychopy_pos_from_trackbox }

`get_psychopy_pos_from_trackbox(win, p, units=None)`

Convert Tobii TBCS coordinates to PsychoPy coordinates.

### Parameters

| Name    | Type                   | Description                                                                                     | Default   |
|---------|------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| `win`   | psychopy.visual.Window | The PsychoPy window which provides information about units and size.                            | required  |
| `p`     | tuple                  | The Tobii TBCS coordinates to convert.                                                          | required  |
| `units` | str, optional          | The units for the PsychoPy coordinates. Default is None, which uses the window's default units. | `None`    |

### Returns

| Type   | Description                         |
|--------|-------------------------------------|
| tuple  | The converted PsychoPy coordinates. |

### Raises

| Type       | Description                              |
|------------|------------------------------------------|
| ValueError | If the provided units are not supported. |
